
```{r}
library(Deriv)
f = function(x) {x*exp(-x^2)}
df = Deriv(f)
df
```
```{r}
x = seq(-1,3,length=1000)

plot(x,f(x),type='l',main="y = f(x)")
grid()
abline(0,0,col='blue')
abline(v=0,col='blue')
plot(x,df(x),type='l',main="dy/dx = f'(x)")
grid()
abline(0,0,col='blue')
abline(v=0,col='blue')

```
